Engineering Mathematics Section, Faculty of Engineering and Technology, Annamalai University, Annamalai Nagar,-, 608002, Tamil Nadu, India.

head.abstracts: © Palestine Polytechnic University-PPU 2023.In this paper, we generalize linear canonical curvelet transform to quaternion valued signals, known as quaternion linear canonical curvelet transform (QLCCT). Firstly, we investigate Parseval’s formula, Inversion formula and characterization of range. Finally, we have formulated a couple of Heisenberg’s Uncertainty principle’s associated with quaternion linear canonical curvelet transform.

coredata.dc:description: In this paper, we generalize linear canonical curvelet transform to quaternion valued signals, known as quaternion linear canonical curvelet transform (QLCCT). Firstly, we investigate Parseval’s formula, Inversion formula and characterization of range. Finally, we have formulated a couple of Heisenberg’s Uncertainty principle’s associated with quaternion linear canonical curvelet transform.
coredata.dc:title: Quaternion Linear Canonical Curvelet Transform
